sailpoint.object

Class AbstractChangeEvent<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      • sailpoint.object.AbstractChangeEvent<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationChangeEvent, CertificationScheduleChangeEvent, IdentityChangeEvent

    public abstract class AbstractChangeEvent<T>
extends AbstractXmlObject
    An event that gets fired when an object is created/update/deleted.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
